content.rendered:
Directed by Srijit Mukherji. Srijit Mukherji. Cast. Amitabh Bachcha. Pallavi Shard. Naseeruddin Sha. Flora Sain. Vidya Bala. Ashish Vidyarth. Chunky Pande. Gauahar Kha. Rajesh Sharm. Ridhiema Tiwar. Rajit Kapoo. Misht.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Narrator). Pallavi Sharda(Gulabo). Naseeruddin Shah(Rajaji). Flora Saini(Maina (as Fllora Saini)). Vidya Balan(Begum Jaan). Ashish Vidyarthi(Harshvardhan). Chunky Pandey(Kabir). Gauahar Khan(Rubina (as Gauhar Khan)). Rajesh Sharma(Shyam). Ridhiema Tiwari(Amba (as Ridhima Tiwari)). Rajit Kapoor(Ilias). Mishti(Shabnam). Priyanka Setia(Jameela). Vivek Mushran(Master). Pitobash(Surjeet). Ila Arun(Amma). Poonam Rajput(Rani). Sanjay Gurbaxani(Jawaharlal Nehru). Gracy Goswami(Laadli). Raviza Chauhan(Lata). Ashok Kumar Dhanuka(Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel). Sumit Nijhawan(Salim Mirza). Rajesh Shinde(Muslim). Raja Biswas(Cyril Radcliffe). Patrick Eyre(Louis Mountbatten). Steve Burroughs(Hastings Ismay)

Language Hindi.

Producers Mukesh Bhatt. Sakshi Bhatt. Vishesh Bhatt. Milind Dabke. Sumit Sabharwal.

Production PLAY Entertainment. PLAY Entertainment. SVF Entertainment.
